title: Canada in world war one
creator_credit: Tim Wilson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Suitable for classroom use, this film shows World War 1 in the context of world developments before and since. It presents a vivid and authentic record of events from 1914 to 1918, in Canada and Europe. In this film, young Canadians see what they are asked to “remember” on November 11th. Written by Strowan Robertson and edited by David Green.
